item.description:
VALENTINES BASH Dance Party with SinglesCT.com AGE GROUP 30’s * 40 ‘s * 50’s

SAT FEB 13 - 8 pm VALENTINES BASH DANCE PARTY

at the beautiful Whinstone Tavern

Join Singles CT .com And Hundreds Of Local Singles

Dance The Night Away -Meet Someone Special And Party With Singles CT .com

“Singles Dances provide the opportunity to meet many local singles all in one place!
So if you dance, don't dance, or just want to party with other local singles and meet someone special,
and check out the next Singles CT Dance Party”

Your Ticket Includes:

* Appetizers Buffet*
* DJ Dance Music and Requests *
* Prizes and Giveaways
*Plenty of FREE Safe Parking *

at the

Whinstone Tavern
245 Hartford Road
New Britain, CT 06053

1.5 from WESTFARMS MALL * Next to Stanley Golf Course

Plenty of FREE Safe Parking

Don’t miss this exciting night of Fun and Romance
– and Party with SinglesCT.com and Local Singles waiting to meet you!

COUPLES ARE WELCOME TO PARTY WITH US

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... or CLICK HERE

Call (860) 236-3343

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: SAT FEB 13 -8pm VALENTINES BASH at the Whinstone Tavern
